message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me there?
I understand your offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $110?
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you see if you can do that for me?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob. How about we try $108?
I'm getting close to accepting, but I still think I can get a better deal. How about we try $106? I'm willing to meet you halfway from there
I'm willing to meet you halfway from $106, Bob. How about we try $107?
I think we're really close now, but I'd like to try to get it down a bit further. How about we try $105? I'm willing to meet you halfway from there
I'm getting close to your price, Bob. How about we try $105.50?
